creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Mr. Eugene J. Carpenter
description: chairs, pair of, cabriole legs with acanthus carved on the knees; the carving of acanthus continues into and forms the ear of the knee; the top is carved into a tassellated curtain simple leaf design; Dutch grooved feet; slip seats upholstered in blue brocaded silk; these chairs were sometimes called Hogarth chairs; George II
title: Side chair, one of a pair
